author: chirino
msg: Protocol handlers can now supply a richer ConnectionStatus dto so that users can see more details about that current status of a connection.

author: chirino
msg: Fixing session shutdown.  If a session as closed while a producer was blocked we would remain blocked.

author: veithen
msg: * Modified the build so that the version and date in the README.txt file are updated automatically.
